SELECT DISTINCT MC.CouponNo AS couponNo, MC.RuleCode AS ruleCode, MC.CouponType AS couponType, MC.CouponCode AS couponCode, MC.RelatedNoA AS relationBill, MC.UserBP AS userBP, MC.BPCode AS bpCode, MC.Status AS status, G.MemberCode AS userMemCode, G.MemberPhone AS userMobile, CONVERT(VARCHAR, MC.StartTime, 23) AS startTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, MC.EndTime, 23) AS endTime, MC.ValidFlag AS validFlag, CONVERT(VARCHAR,MC.FinshTime , 20) AS useTime, G.TradeNoIF AS billCode, G.CounterCode AS counterCode, CI.CounterNameIF AS counterName, G.MemberName AS memberName FROM Promotion.BIN_MemberCoupon MC WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_GetIntelligentResultMain G ON (MC.RelatedNoB=G.TradeNoIF AND MC.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = G.BIN_OrganizationInfoID) LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo MCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON G.MemberCode = MCI.MemCode LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemberInfo MI WITH(NOLOCK) ON MCI.BIN_MemberInfoID = MI.BIN_MemberInfoID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo CI WITH(NOLOCK) ON G.CounterCode=CI.CounterCode WHERE MC.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND (MC.Status = 'OK' or MC.Status = 'CK')
MC.CouponNo = #couponNo#
MC.CouponType = #couponType#
G.TradeNoIF = #searchBillCode#
G.MemberCode = #searchMemberCode#
G.MemberPhone = #searchMobile#
CI.BIN_OrganizationID = #prmCounterId#
CONVERT(DATE, MC.FinshTime) >= CONVERT(DATE, #startTime#)
CONVERT(DATE, MC.FinshTime) <= CONVERT(DATE, #endTime#)
MC.RelatedNoA = #relationBill#
MC.UserBP = #bpCode#
MC.ValidFlag = #validFlag#
MC.ValidFlag = '1'
MC.RuleCode = #couponRule#
